lines.text: Force does not change system’s total energy after complete loop

secText:
Lesson:
1. Determine the effect of positive and negative [OBJ:expsec_f986:work done on a system] on its energy.
2. Determine the effect of [OBJ:expsec_f987:work done by a system] on its energy.
3. Define [OBJ:expsec_f988:conservative forces].
4. Define [OBJ:expsec_f989:non-conservative forces].
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_work_done_and_by:Work Done On or By An Object and Energy], [OBJ:sum_conservative_non_conservative:Conservative and Non-Conservative Forces]
